text: "Girl On TV" is a song written and recorded by the American boy band LFO. It was released in November 1999, from their album LFO. The song was also their second single and peaked at number 10 in the U.S. Billboard Hot 100[ LFO songs - Girl on TV]. Billboard.com on November 30 (after reaching the Top 40 on November 16) and number 6 in the UK, where it was their biggest hit. "Girl on TV" was certified Gold by RIAA in 2000 for the shipment of over 500,000 copies in the US.RIAA Gold & Platinum Searchable Database - LFO singles. RIAA.com ==Background== Band member Rich Cronin began dating actress Jennifer Love Hewitt in 1999 after meeting her backstage at the Blockbuster Entertainment Awards.https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=yQkHHVSwQOA Cronin wrote "Girl on TV" about Hewitt, and she also appeared in the music video, directed by Gregory Dark.
